website_summaries.verdict: Users love this scent and gentle formula so much they don't reserve it just for baby clothes.
pros: Even households full of adults love this detergent
The scent is described as spring wildflowers with honeysuckle, butterfly violets, apple, lemon, and mint
Those with very sensitive skin or allergies love the gentle enzyme-based cleanser formula that also works on stains
cons: Pricey, but still has loyal customers due to quality and scent

customer_reviews.title: but this is great. Been using this laundry soap exclusively for 2 ...
customer_reviews.text: Adults only in our house, not sure why this is marketed for baby laundry, but this is great. Been using this laundry soap exclusively for 2 years. It smells really nice but is faint so it doesn’t overwhelm you with detergent smell like be big brands. My husband works with oils and chemicals in his job and his clothes are filthy but this effectively cleans them. He’s also sensitive to regular detergents and will get rashes but this has never caused a problem. I’ve also noticed less fading than I used to get in clothes when I used to use a big brand detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Jolly

customer_reviews.title: best baby detergent
customer_reviews.text: LO doesn't have any sensitivity can't talk to that but the smell is great. Have used others and they aren't nearly as nice. They seem to be watered down. This one is much better and have no issues with it. Have reordered already. **Please help and select if you thought this was helpful!!
customer_reviews.author: Bethany JohnsonTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: Great, light fragrance.  Hypoallergenic and cleans clothes well, just not oils.
customer_reviews.text: LOVE the smell! Cleans well regarding regular stains and use. It is VERY hypoallergenic! I'm allergic to EVERYTHING! However, does NOT get out grease or oils.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Whole Family, Sensitive Skin, Smells Mild and Wonderful
customer_reviews.text: We started using this detergent for ALL of our laundry - yes even my husband's business shirts. My older daughter, 3 years old, has super sensitive skin and will break out wearing clothes washed with regular Tide (as happened twice whilst we were on vacation.) It smells quite wonderful and mild and it isn't overpowering. It also does a great job of washing but also soaking our stains.
customer_reviews.author: LizzieS

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on skin and clothes, but cleans great
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this since my kids were babies, now 7 and 9. It smells so nice and mild and cleans the clothes so well without stripping the color or harsh chemicals. My only complaint is that I wish the company made a fabric softener to match.
customer_reviews.author: millie’s mommy

customer_reviews.title: I love this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff! It’s smells so good and gets the clothes clean. If I use regular detergent on my little ones panties it breaks her out but If I use this I have no problem. I just went ahead and subscribed cause I know I’ll keep buying it.
customer_reviews.author: HDWEST

customer_reviews.title: Good price, just needs some spill prevention during shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing and seems to clean my laundry! My kids and I have sensitive skin and are allergic to most soaps... this one doesn’t bother our skin and I love that it has a beautiful smell! My only problem was with the packaging, they came and had opened during shipping and spilled a little. I think a tab under the lid would have saved it or some tape?
customer_reviews.author: Malia M

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my toddler but the whole family loves it
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased this as a next step from the unscented detergents we used on my newborn, but am now using it for the family laundry. Love the light, clean scent and nobody has had any allergies to it. Still recommend spot treating specific stains but this does a pretty good job at getting all the everyday spills and messes out.
customer_reviews.author: Sims

customer_reviews.title: Gentle on skin, great scent
customer_reviews.text: We love this detergent! Started using it on my newborn baby after a friend raved about it; my son has pretty sensitive skin and it gets easily irritated. This detergent is so gentle on his skin, and still gets his clothes perfectly clean. I love the scent: light and sweet, not perfumey or artificial. It smells so good I’ve started washing my clothes in it too!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Mueller

customer_reviews.title: Perfect subtle clean scent for babies
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the scent of this detergent! Just did my first load of laundry for our baby that will be here soon and the subtle scent of floral/honey suckle is perfect for a new baby. Smells clean and the scent isn’t overpowering like I’ve read some brands could be. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B

customer_reviews.title: great for baby laundry
customer_reviews.text: Love the scent, baby is ok with it, MUCH BETTER THAN DREFT!! less chemicals for sure. But if you're looking for chemical free everything, go to Purehaven.com They don't make a liquid chemical free detergent but they have powder, if you can use powder in your machine instead, I highly recommend that brand!! I only use their shampoo/ body wash, lotion and mom balm (nipple balm) since their products are AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.author: ACE

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing & Cleans Well
customer_reviews.text: This smells fantastic in my opinion! I used it mostly for my kids' clothes, blankets and sometimes for my own clothes. It gives the whole house a nice scent. I also but Caldrea's room freshener in pear and blue agave and the scent is almost identical.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells like waking up in a garden
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of it! It’s mild and a little bit floral and fresh. I do find that it doesn’t clean as well as other major brands but I still use it because I love the smell.
customer_reviews.author: SL。214

customer_reviews.title: Smells good in the bottle but a bit musty
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell in the bottle but I've noticed that my clothes smell like sweaty, stale laundry after they've been cleaned. Disappointed because I LOVE all of Mrs. Meyer's other products. Cleans well but the after smell is not so great.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: I really like the smell of the product. First time try it and will see if there's any allergy for my baby.
customer_reviews.author: Rickie Lee

customer_reviews.title: Gentle yet thorough
customer_reviews.text: Extremely mild, but still gets the job done. I washed clothes for my upcoming newborn, as well as a few clothing items for my 10 year old. All of it came out washed very clean, no overbearing scent at all. :) just lovely. I will rely on this once my baby is here.
customer_reviews.author: Jett

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as natural as I thought but does clean well
customer_reviews.text: Smells great but it has fragrance added to it, which I thought it was just essential oils, apparently not. I should have done more research before buying :/
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Poor packaging
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed in the delivery/packaging, both bottles leaked and had detergent all down the side.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander V.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: It’s okay. I bought because Dreft’s new scent is sickening and this detergent has the same scent but way lighter. So, if you don’t like Dreft’s new scent, don’t waste your time buying this one. Other than that, it’s okay. Like I said, it’s not too strong of a scent, which is good.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Trump

customer_reviews.title: Awesome smell!
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell is this. I have been searching high and low for the Meyers baby blossom hand wash and can’t find it. Meyers makes great products!
customer_reviews.author: Amber Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Favorite scent
customer_reviews.text: This is my all time favorite Mrs. Meyers scent. I wish it came in all the things! It's supposed to be for babies but I just LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Very dissappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I have not been impressed with this laundry detergent at all. I have tried using various amounts and even washed clothes several times. It just leaves a very unclean odor to freshly washed clothing and just does not get smell out of my workout clothing!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this scent!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product so much! I never thought I would switch from Tide, but this scent is worth it!! I wish they made more products in this scent! I just wish it was more affordable!
customer_reviews.author: lillydornik

customer_reviews.title: Lovely scent
customer_reviews.text: I love this stuff. I try other soaps sometimes and just keep coming back to this one. heavenly smell.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Sundermeyer

customer_reviews.title: My fav scent for baby
customer_reviews.text: Used for 1.5 years and can’t get enough of this scent👌🏽
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Paz-Luukkonen

customer_reviews.title: My FAVORITE scent by Mrs
customer_reviews.text: My FAVORITE scent by Mrs. Meyer's! I use on all of my baby's items. This scent is wonderful! So fresh, light and not over powering. It is very hard to find in stores and I am so glad that Amazon carries it!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Great light scent
customer_reviews.text: Such a great light scent. I usually buy unscented/sensitive skin products, but this has worked great for my family.
customer_reviews.author: AshleyS384

customer_reviews.title: smells like heaven
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love this smell!!!!!! my baby just turned 11 months and I am just now buying my second set of 2. lasts a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Works well, no irritation and I think my 4 month old has sensitive skin. Good sized bottle still on first one
customer_reviews.author: Yelnam

customer_reviews.title: Buy this for baby
customer_reviews.text: Love this detergent. Used it instead of Dreft (which I hate the smell of). Have been using it on baby clothes, blankets, etc without issue.
customer_reviews.author: leeny

customer_reviews.title: Strong smell in the bottle
customer_reviews.text: It's a bit strong smelling at first. I worry about it being too much for a new baby
customer_reviews.author: SWELLNOEL

customer_reviews.title: Great scent and wash
customer_reviews.text: The scent is great. It smells so good right after wash but does fade within a day or so (which I don’t mind for baby). Clothes look and feel great, will definitely be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Haley

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but container leaked in shipping
customer_reviews.text: I love Mrs. Meyers, however the top somehow was loose and I lost about 1/10 of the product... Just annoyed, but will buy again! FYI when Target ships their liquids, they seal them at the top with tape!
customer_reviews.author: Out of Control Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Great for new baby
customer_reviews.text: This detergent works great for cloth diapers. Love the very light, fresh scent. Baby hasn't had skin issues since I started using this.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie

customer_reviews.title: Baby shower gift
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my niece. I knew she would be nesting soon and it was perfect timing. Nursery is ready...still waiting for baby!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: The absolute best detergent. The scent is fabulous!!! I make sure to always wash the sheets with this. Cause of the scent and gentleness
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Mrs. Meyers! Beautiful clean fresh scent and washes great!
customer_reviews.author: CTM

customer_reviews.title: I love that this is a product that is safe for ...
customer_reviews.text: I love that this is a product that is safe for my baby! Great smell! However, it does not seem to clean as well as other detergents that I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: They used to make spray cleaner in Baby Blossom scent. Where'd it go? I buy this relatively expensive detergent only for its scent. Smells so good!
customer_reviews.author: Candace Barron

customer_reviews.title: Lovely scent and cleans well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this months before we had our son and fell in LOVE!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stusmoo412

customer_reviews.title: Bottles busted open
customer_reviews.text: Usually a great product received my package today and both bottles were busted open. Quite the mess. Giving 3 stars because I love Meyers brand and use it for all of our cleaning needs.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea Babala

customer_reviews.title: For adults too
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have a baby, just happened to use this once and had to buy it for myself. Great light scent.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Baby detergent
customer_reviews.text: Works amazing, remove heavy stains, smell amazing. Me and my family loved
customer_reviews.author: BRUNA ARAUJO

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for the money. I love the scent and the cleaning power of the detergent. We’ve ordered twice and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Smells nice and is on the more natural end of the spectrum but doesn't get formula stains out at all.
customer_reviews.author: Ashby

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this since our baby was born, I love the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia Ostrowski

customer_reviews.title: i love the smell
customer_reviews.text: i love the smell, so fresh . its unique gentle fresh smell gives me more connection to my baby. when i smell it, reminds me of all the cuddling when she was a few months old
customer_reviews.author: Peaches

customer_reviews.title: Smells good and works well
customer_reviews.text: Works on cloth diapers - no poop stains yet! I prefer this scent to Dreft and even wash my own clothes in it.
customer_reviews.author: sammo

customer_reviews.title: Really like the smell of this
customer_reviews.text: Really like the smell of this. Very subtle but sweet. I like it much much better than the dreft product that I had gotten as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: db1981

customer_reviews.title: Washes great. Gentle for babies
customer_reviews.text: Smells divine! Washes great. Gentle for babies. We love this product.
customer_reviews.author: sanddollar8

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing scent
customer_reviews.text: I use this product to wash my babies laundry. The scent is pleasant without being overwhelming.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I've been using it for my baby since she was born!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsi

customer_reviews.title: Tell a friend
customer_reviews.text: I so love this product I use it for my new born baby clothes the scent is amazing and a little does go a long way
customer_reviews.author: Iris

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: Use a bit with fragrance free pods in most loads for a hint of fresh scent
customer_reviews.author: BoyMama

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: I love the fresh blossom scent and the detergent is cleansing yet delicate on baby’s clothes. So far it’s the only detergent I use for my baby
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much better than dreft
customer_reviews.text: Best laundry detergent ever. Smells so good. Wish it wasn't so expensive
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Horrible shipping package.
customer_reviews.text: Product is great love the scent but half the detergent leaked out onto the box. Was not properly packaged. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Nikolette Sphar

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell
customer_reviews.text: We use this for the whole family! My kids have sensitive skin and this doesn’t cause any problems. Love the smell!
customer_reviews.author: happyfam

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product! I’ve used this detergent for both my children. It serves its job properly, cleans and smells great!
customer_reviews.author: Vixx

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for sensitive skin!!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s the best thing for sensitive skin!!!! I love this product and it has such a faint amazing scent that is perfect!!!
customer_reviews.author: Debk808

customer_reviews.title: Smells & cleans great
customer_reviews.text: Love it , the smell and cleans so well while being a safer option
customer_reviews.author: Shannon

customer_reviews.title: Genuinely good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Definitely has the most long lasting scent of all the Meyers soap
customer_reviews.author: Genevieve

customer_reviews.title: Very pleasant smelling.
customer_reviews.text: Smells amazing! Better than other baby laundry detergents. It does not irritate my baby's sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Love love love!
customer_reviews.text: Smells so fresh & clean!! So much better then yucky Dreft!!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Sadly one bottle had a broken lid, pretty sturdy box.
customer_reviews.author: Amberrm

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way!
customer_reviews.text: I love the product. The only thing I use for my baby's clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Paris Fant

customer_reviews.title: Did not receive Baby Blossom
customer_reviews.text: Did not come as advertised. Received Basil not Baby Blossom. Too time consuming to return as we need for vacation in 2 days. Need to run to store now to find correct, safe for baby formula.
customer_reviews.author: emmy kupper

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! You need VERY little for a very clean, wonderful smelling load of laundry. It's even septic safe. It actually gets my clothes cleaner than tide did, even with using half the volume of detergent. I never would have imagined that. I'm never going back!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Awesome for my sensitive skin.
customer_reviews.text: This is a lifesaver. I have extremely sensitive skin and normally have to wash my delicates separately with baby detergents because even regular hypoallergenic formulas cause reactions. Mrs Meyer’s cleans all of my clothes and does not irritate my skin. Best of all, it has a soft fresh-smelling fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Deceitfully Toxic!
customer_reviews.text: Double check what is in these products. The labels are misleading! Use the app "Think Dirty" and you can see a breakdown of all the toxic and harmful ingredients present in products that claim to be "clean" and good for you! So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Grant

customer_reviews.title: Sensitive skin home and this is perfect for us
customer_reviews.text: My children and I all have sensitive skin. This is the best natural detergent I’ve found that we can use with a sweet smell. It’s light and not over powering. Our clothes come out clean and don’t look worn. It’s our go to now. For simple stains it tends to h=get them out as well if I forget to pretreat.
customer_reviews.author: Thesearlenest

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: The scent is amazing. I like using this for my delicates as well. It’s gentle, but cleans thoroughly. Things I thought might stain have been magically removed through the combination of my washer and the detergent. A little bit goes a long way as well. It seems to last longer than my regular, normal-wash detergent.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Just ok
customer_reviews.text: Smells great but doesn’t remove stains of any kind. I have to use a harsh chemical to get them out which kind of defeats the purpose
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very strong scent
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly very strong scent. Considering this is for babies I thought it would be more mild. I ended up buying seventh generation free and clear with no fragrance and I add a splash of this for a bit of scent.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Big fans
customer_reviews.text: We love this scent. Fresh and only slightly floral, but natural smelling. We use it for all our laundry - not just the baby’s!
customer_reviews.author: RB

customer_reviews.title: Great Detergent!
customer_reviews.text: We’ve been using this detergent for our kids for a while and have never had any issues. The smell is not overpowering and it does a great job of cleaning after infants and toddlers!
customer_reviews.author: Ariel

customer_reviews.title: Much lighter scent, same cleaning
customer_reviews.text: Works just like the other Mrs Meyer detergents but the scent is MUCH more subtle. I’m sensitive to scents and this doesn’t bother me. A light, clean floral that doesn’t cling to your dried laundry. Not baby-ish.
customer_reviews.author: J. C. Worth

customer_reviews.title: My FAVE
customer_reviews.text: His clothes smell so clean and baby like with this product. I don't know when I will stop using it. I love it so much.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Running low
customer_reviews.text: Was running low. This arrived quickly, thank goodness. I really do like mrs meyers clean day laundry detergent. Can't go wrong with the baby blossom scent. Reminds me of spring
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way! This detergent cleans well and smells great! When I'm hand washing things I'm always surprised by how little I have to use compared to when I hand wash with Kirkland brand detergent.
customer_reviews.author: Leena

customer_reviews.title: Cleans,smells nice (rate for skin allergy friendly detergents!) Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: No babies in the house, but it's the only good smelling detergent that actually cleans and smells nice!
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Smells Good!
customer_reviews.text: Smells good and provided a safe cleaning for my LO’s clothes.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: It’s one of my regular laundry detergent. The smell is gentle. The price is ok too.

customer_reviews.title: Smell
customer_reviews.text: This has become one of my favorite detergents. Clean, fresh smell. Safe in clothes.

customer_reviews.title: Scent is heavenly
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and washes well, too. Very pricey, as you can see.
customer_reviews.author: Myriah Salinas

customer_reviews.title: Honeysuckle- very nice!
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of honeysuckle! This is the first time I've bought the laundry soap- I do like it!
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I love this laundry soap
customer_reviews.text: I love this laundry soap. Hands down the best option for you infant, toddler or yourself! Mild detergent with a nice scent
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Stay away
customer_reviews.text: Way too strong of a scent. I wanted to use for bedding in the house since I have kids abd dogs. Gave everyone rashes. You are better off using a free and clear detergent with a version of mrs myers softner.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle Gracey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't bother our allergies
customer_reviews.text: Finally a scented detergent that doesn't trigger our allergies! It smells wonderful, even for adults. Definitely will be buying more

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought it
customer_reviews.text: Love the smell and doesn’t cause my baby any skin issues.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is such a wonderful scent its nice and light. It is perfect for my baby's clothing.

customer_reviews.title: An okay product..  a bit too expensive
customer_reviews.text: It has a gentle fragrance that is great for baby clothes. I believe it is a safe/ environment friendly product but still seems a bit too expensive.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, works great, need very little, and no rashes on Baby.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best laundry detergent! Gets stains out, nice smell.

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: This laundry detergent smells so good! I use it for my baby’s clothes, as well as mine.

customer_reviews.title: Smells wonderful.
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing smelling laundry detergent. I’m hooked!

product_meta.title: Mrs. Meyer's Clean Day Liquid Laundry Detergent, Cruelty Free and Biodegradable Formula, Baby Blossom Scent, 64 oz- Pack of 2
product_meta.description: Size:64 Fl Oz (Pack of 2)Mrs. Meyer’s Clean Day biodegradable laundry detergent features hard-working yet gentle cleaning agents, while also providing a special, singular scent for your entire home. The blossoms of spring wildflowers star in this scented detergent with fragrances of honeysuckle and butterfly violets with a tiny touch of apple, lemon and mint. So gentle and fresh for you and baby. Effective yet gentle on clothes, our concentrated laundry soap really packs a punch when it comes to removing dirt and grime. Contains surfactants from plant-derived sources, dirt and stain-fighting enzymes, other thoughtfully chosen ingredients and, of course, those important essential oils. This liquid detergent is HE compatible. Concentrated for 64 loads of laundry. Also available in other garden inspired scents and products such as body lotions, liquid hand soaps, candles, and so much more! Mrs. Meyer’s – rooted in goodness.
feature_bullets: Concentrated detergent formula is effective yet gentle on clothes
Contains plant-derived cleaning ingredients with dirt and stain-fighting enzymes
Biodegradable, HE laundry detergent for use in high efficiency and conventional washing machines
Baby blossom scented laundry soap with aromas of spring wildflowers, apple & mint

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
